title: Bloomberg Businessweek Special Edition with David Rubenstein
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Special Edition with David Rubenstein
description:
David Rubenstein, Co-Founder and Co-Chairman of the Carlyle Group, discusses a variety of topics including politics, trade, the economy and investing. Joining him are Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, Bloomberg News Washington Bureau Chief Craig Gordon, Bloomberg News Senior Trade Reporter Shawn Donnan, Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber, Bloomberg News Senior Writer Stephanie Baker, Bloomberg News Bond Reporter Alex Harris, Bloomberg News Managing Editor of U.S. Economy Peggy Collins, Henri Pierre-Jacques and Jarrid Tingle, Managing Partners and Co-Founders of Harlem Capital Partners, and Michael Cuggino, President of Permanent Portfolio Family Funds. And we hear an excerpt from David Rubenstein’s Peer to Peer interview with Former U.S. Treasury Secretary Hank Paulson.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and David Rubenstein. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
